description: Parks Canada Agency (PCA) is launching a Request for Information (RFI) process by inviting interested parties seeking appropriate commercial or residential investment opportunities for select residential properties in Rouge National Urban Park (RNUP) to review and respond to this RFI.
full_summary:
# Request for Information - Vacant Building Rehabilitation (Rouge National Urban Park)
## Request for Information (RFI)
Parks Canada Agency invites interested parties to participate in a Request for Information (RFI) process to review and submit responses for vacant building rehabilitation opportunities in Rouge National Urban Park.

### Contract Information
- **Contract Reference:** PW-22-01007111
- **Contract Type:** Competitive – Open Bidding (CNST)
- **Division:** Construction Services (5129B)
- **Region:** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

### Timeline
- **Publication Date:** September 13, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date:** October 24, 2022, at 14:00:00
- **Tender Status:** Expiring

### Contact Information
- **Contact Name:** Deandra Patterson
- **Contact Email:** <deandra.patterson@pc.gc.ca>
- **Contact Phone:** 416-918-7308

### RFI Documents
Please download and complete the provided template to submit your response:
- **English RFI Response Template:** <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/13/61a0c9b94c03ebe8f529ed0a312c77b7/english_rfi_response_template.pdf>
- **French RFI Response Template:** <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/13arie3/a605420ee48d59923c4aebcf95d70d33/french_rfi_response_template.pdf>

Parks Canada encourages interested parties to respond to this RFI to inform potential future bidding opportunities for vacant building rehabilitation in Rouge National Urban Park. 

Please contact Deandra Patterson at 416-918-7308 or by email at <deandra.patterson@pc.gc.ca> for any inquiries or additional information. 

Note: We have used a maximum of 400 words. We hope this rewritten version reflects the professionalism and clarity expected from a government tender announcement. 

Please let me know if we need to adjust the text. I'm happy to accommodate if necessary. 

**Précis de l'avis de renseignements – Remise en état des bâtiments vacants (parc urbain national de la Rouge)**

 Vous pouvez poster ici commentaires et suggestiones de mise en français. Je serais ravi d'entend
